meanings: small dish (usu. one of several accompanying rice)

lessons.japanese: 今晩のおかずはもう決めてあります。
lessons.english: I've decided what to cook for dinner.

lessons.japanese: 今晩のおかずはもう決めてあります。
lessons.english: I've decided what to cook for dinner.

lessons.japanese: え、たこ焼きをおかずにするの？
lessons.english: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main food ideas?

lessons.japanese: え、たこ焼きをおかずにするの？
lessons.english: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main set meal items?

lessons.japanese: え、たこ焼きをおかずにするの？
lessons.english: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main food ideas?

lessons.japanese: え、たこ焼きをおかずにするの？
lessons.english: What, you decided to have takoyaki as one of your main set meal items?

lessons.japanese: おかずがなくて、しまいにはご飯にソースかけて食べた。
lessons.english: There were no side dishes with the rice, so I ended up putting sauce on it and eating it like that.

lessons.japanese: おかずがなくて、しまいにはご飯にソースかけて食べた。
lessons.english: There were no side dishes with the rice, so I ended up putting sauce on it and eating it like that.
